alert.note: Alert for Upper Treasure Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 09 at 4:55AM MST until January 10 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and wind expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches, highest along the foothills. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Upper Treasure Valley zone. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Snow will impact the morning commute today and on Wednesday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow amounts of 1 to 2 inches this morning, decreasing to snow showers this afternoon and evening. Snow increasing late tonight into Wednesday morning with another 1 to 3 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
